member.name: M:StudentOrganizer.Api.Controllers.AssignmentsController.AddAssignment(System.Guid,StudentOrganizer.Infrastructure.Commands.Assignments.AddAssignment)
member.remarks:
If sending courseId don't send the semester because it will be overwritten by the semester of specified course.
Otherwise if not sending courseId you should send the semester of the given assignment
